title: Riot, can you give me my buddylist?
body:
I lost access to an account that had years worth of friends built up on it. I was wondering if there is any way that I can have that list somehow transferred or given to me in some way or form.

Yes it was due to Perma ban. No I didn't see it coming.

I want to contact my friends. A lot of them are going to wonder what happened to me and I want to be able to show them that I am okay.

Is this allowed?

replies.body:
Generally, this wouldn't be something we could do. Depending on the circumstances of how long ago it was and how your account looks now, it might be something we could look into doing for you though!

Hit up our player behavior team in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) to see about getting that done!
